description: This Kotlin file defines a Fragment class 'LibraryFragment' for an Android application, used to display a placeholder library view for playlists and saved tracks. It includes a companion object with a factory method to create new instances and overrides 'onCreateView' to set up the fragment's layout.

classes.name: LibraryFragment
classes.description: Defines a fragment for the library view, with a static factory method and lifecycle method override.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates and returns a new instance of LibraryFragment.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout and returns the View.
